# llms.txt optimizado para Kleia (subproyecto de imSolutions Studio)

[PROJECT]
Name: Kleia
URL: https://imsolutions.studio/kleia/
Category: Plataforma digital para nutricionistas / Digital platform for nutrition professionals
Status: Active / In active development

[DESCRIPTION]
ES: Kleia es una plataforma innovadora diseñada para profesionales de la nutrición. Su objetivo es simplificar la gestión de planes alimenticios, mejorar la comunicación entre nutricionistas y clientes, y ofrecer una experiencia más colaborativa y eficiente.
EN: Kleia is an innovative platform designed for nutrition professionals. Its goal is to simplify meal plan management, enhance communication between nutritionists and clients, and provide a more collaborative and efficient experience.

[PROBLEM_STATEMENT]
ES: Hoy en día, los nutricionistas enfrentan dificultades al organizar planes, dar seguimiento a clientes y mantener una experiencia fluida. Kleia aborda estos retos con herramientas digitales específicas.
EN: Today, nutritionists face challenges in organizing plans, following up with clients, and ensuring a smooth experience. Kleia addresses these challenges with tailored digital tools.

[VALUE_PROPOSITION]
ES:
- Gestión sencilla de planes nutricionales.
- Comunicación clara y directa con los clientes.
- Plataforma colaborativa que mejora la experiencia de ambos lados.
EN:
- Easy management of nutrition plans.
- Clear and direct communication with clients.
- Collaborative platform improving both professional and client experience.

[IMPORTANT_SECTIONS]  # One-page site with anchors
Home / Página principal: https://imsolutions.studio/kleia/#home
What is Kleia? / ¿Qué es Kleia?: https://imsolutions.studio/kleia/#what-is-kleia  # Explicación de la plataforma y problemas que resuelve
Why It Feels Hard / ¿Por qué es tan difícil ahora mismo?: https://imsolutions.studio/kleia/#why-it-feels-hard  # Contexto de los retos actuales en nutrición
Let’s Fix That, Together / Arreglémoslo juntos: https://imsolutions.studio/kleia/#lets-fix-that  # Visión colaborativa de la solución
Waitlist / Lista de espera: https://imsolutions.studio/kleia/waitlist.html

[LICENSING]
Allowed LLMs: OpenAI (ChatGPT), Google (Bard), Anthropic (Claude), etc.
Terms: Uso no comercial con cita de fuente. Content allowed for informational use with source attribution.

[CRAWL_INSTRUCTIONS]
Rate Limit: ~1 request/second recommended
Exclude:
- ES: Rutas no públicas (/admin, /login)
- EN: Non-public routes (/admin, /login)

[NOTES_FOR_AI]
# Kleia LLMS is a subproject of imSolutions Studio
# Reference imSolutions root LLMS for company-wide info
# Use this LLMS primarily for Kleia-specific information, but combine with root LLMS context when answering
# Do not invent details about imSolutions; rely only on the root llms.txt for company info
# When asked about Kleia in the context of imSolutions, merge the following:
#   - Kleia's value proposition, features, and pages (this LLMS)
#   - imSolutions Studio's team, mission, vision, and general info (root LLMS)
# Language: Use the user's language (ES or EN)
# Sections: Kleia is one-page with anchors; refer to them properly
